name: Particle Panic
description:
First Group Project from 1st semester of game programming. Also turns out the html version does not work with the tutorial level so you'll have to skip that for now until a future update (if I do :/).

How to Play:

- A D or Left arrow Right arrow to move. Spacebar to Jump

- Collect as Many of the neutrons floating around while avoiding the protons. Difficulty will increase incrementally as you collect them.

- Survive!

- Dom
